name: Spicy Bacon Cheeseburger Turkey Wraps
author: socforward88
summary: This ground turkey wrap recipe is one of my favorite recipes when I'm craving a burger but watching calories. Top with your favorite condiments like mustard or ketchup.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon Cajun seasoning, or to taste
¼ cup bacon bits (such as Hormel®)
7 slices pepper Jack cheese (such as Borden®)
directions: Mix turkey with Worcestershire sauce and Cajun seasoning in a bowl
Cook bacon bits, jalapeno pepper, and minced garlic in a skillet over medium-high heat until bacon bits start to stick, about 4 minutes
Add the turkey mixture; cook and stir until no pink remains, about 4 minutes
Place 2 ounces of turkey mixture in each flatbread
Place 4 pickle slices, 1/2 cup spinach, and 1 pepper Jack cheese slice in each wrap
